body: Just completed my first #potterywheel project! Check out my bowl—definitely a bit wobbly, but I’m proud of it! #ceramics #handmade

comments.body: That’s awesome! For a first attempt, it looks great. Was it hard to get the clay centered on the wheel?
@67676 Thanks! Yeah, centering the clay was the hardest part! It kept wobbling all over the place at first.
That bowl has character! Are you planning to glaze it?
@78787 Absolutely! I’m thinking of going for a deep blue glaze. Hopefully, it’ll turn out as nice as I imagine!
Pottery seems so relaxing! How long did it take to make the bowl?
@89898 It really is! The whole process took about two hours, but the time flew by. There’s something really meditative about working with clay.
Did it turn out the way you expected, or was it harder than it looks?
@23232 It’s definitely harder than it looks! I had a vision, but the bowl kind of took on a life of its own. Still happy with the result though!
That’s so cool! What’s your next project? A matching plate maybe?
@34343 Haha, maybe! I’d love to make a full set eventually, but I think I’ll stick to bowls for a bit until I get the hang of it.
